data.text: My stay this time was in late October just before the closure. Weather was balmy and the water of the sea and the pool warm. I am grateful to Vasilis and Katerina who upgraded me to the best possible accommodation and meals scheme. I was spoiled this time with the best view, the best food and the best drinks and as always with the warmest and genuine hospitality. It was so good to see again Fotis, Ivan and Despina in the reception, Enias the hotel manager, Marilena in the mini market and Silvia in the clothes shop. As I mostly stayed inside the hotel this time I relaxed deeply to the point I almost forgot how the real world looks like. I cannot wait to come again to see the moon rising in 2024.
data.title: An out-of-this-world experience

owner_response.title: Owner response
owner_response.text:
Dear Valued Guest,

Thank you for taking the time to leave such a heartfelt review. We are thrilled to hear that your stay in late October was so memorable, and that the weather and warm waters added to your experience. It's wonderful to know that Vasilis and Katerina were able to provide you with an exceptional accommodation and dining experience. We're also glad to hear that our staff, including Fotis, Ivan, Despina, Enias, Marilena, and Silvia, made your stay more enjoyable. It's our aim to offer a relaxing and memorable experience, and we're happy to have achieved that for you. We eagerly anticipate your return in 2024!
owner_response.author: Atrium Hotels and Resorts

data.text:
This year was the third time that my daughter and I have stayed at this wonderful hotel. We visited at the end of July to the beginning of August. 
This year the hotel and the rest of Rhodes faced huge challenges with the unfortunate wild fires which swept through the island while we were there. Never the less the hotel staff coped admirably and we still had a wonderful holiday despite us both falling ill after eating a bad meal at the Asia restaurant.
All of the staff at the hotel are amazing but I would like to give very special thanks to Jani the Manager of pool restaurant who is one the most friendly and helpful people you could ever hope to meet along with his waiter Vladimir, Voula who is fabulous and always gives us the most friendly smile and welcome, The amazing manager at the main buffet restaurant, Vangelis the Chef, all of the beach bar and main bar staff and the hotel manager.
Another MASSIVE thank you must go to Katerina the amazing Operations Manager. We had huge problems getting to the hotel due to the fires but Katerina extremely kindly went above and beyond to make sure we got a room at a sister hotel for the night when the road was blocked by fire. Unfortunately Katerina is no longer based at the Atrium Prestige which is a huge pity as with her there it always feels like our home away from home. Without her there it is still a great hotel but no longer quite feels like home.
data.title: Amazing Hotel

owner_response.title: Owner response
owner_response.text:
Dear Valued Guest,

Thank you for your loyalty and for sharing your experience during such a challenging time. We're grateful that despite the wild fires, our staff made your stay wonderful. Your heartfelt thanks to Katerina are deeply appreciated; her dedication to guest comfort is exemplary. We look forward to welcoming you and your daughter back for another memorable visit.

Warm regards,
owner_response.author: Atrium Hotels and Resorts

data.text: We had a wonderful stay at Atrium Prestige. All staff was extremely friendly and caring. Rooms are spacious with wonderful views. An ideal place to go relax with your family. Thank you very much for making our stay so memorable. We hope to be coming back soon.
data.title: Definitely recommended

owner_response.title: Owner response
owner_response.text:
Dear Valued Guest,

Thank you for choosing Atrium Prestige and for sharing your wonderful experience. We're delighted to hear that our friendly staff, spacious rooms, and beautiful views contributed to a relaxing family stay. Your appreciation means a lot to us, and we're thrilled to have made your stay memorable. We eagerly await your return and look forward to welcoming you back soon.

Warm regards,
owner_response.author: Atrium Hotels and Resorts

data.text: This hotel is stunning. Loved the room options that are set slightly away from the main buildings, reminded me of walking around the streets of Lindos. The hotel is situated away from any resort - the plus side is the Dama Dama deer often appear for a visit! Restaurant options were excellent and food options varied making meal times memorable. Will go back.
data.title: A little bit of paradise, fantastic if you are looking to relax and unwind

owner_response.title: Owner response
owner_response.text:
Dear Valued Guest,

Thank you for your wonderful review. We are delighted to hear that you found our hotel stunning and enjoyed the unique room layout reminiscent of Lindos. It's great to know that the peaceful location and visits from the Dama Dama deer, which are unique to Rhodes, added to your experience. We're also pleased that our restaurant options and variety of food made your meal times memorable. We look forward to welcoming you back for another enjoyable stay.

Best regards,
owner_response.author: Atrium Hotels and Resorts

data.text: Very nice. We have visited this hotel repeatedly, mainly because of the beautiful quiet beach and the amazing beach service. The rooms are very nice and clean. The Greek restaurant by the beach is also excellent. We first discovered the hotel by chance when we went on a trip and wanted to see it. They welcomed us very kindly at the reception and that was the reason why the hotel was our choice from then on. Everyone at the hotel is always and always pleasant. We always choose all inclusive, but it is also possible to choose other alternatives. You ultimately pay for what you order at the reception, so you don't have to carry money even with an option other than all.
data.title: Excelent

owner_response.title: Owner response
owner_response.text:
Dear Valued Guest,

Thank you for your lovely review and for being a repeat guest at our hotel. We're thrilled to hear that our quiet beach, beach service, clean rooms, and Greek restaurant continue to make your stays enjoyable. Your kind words about our reception team and the flexibility of our dining options are much appreciated. We are delighted to be your hotel of choice and look forward to welcoming you back for many more pleasant experiences.

Warm regards,
owner_response.author: Atrium Hotels and Resorts
